title: Los Amantes Clandestinos
description: El Generalissimo is pure evil! He steals love letters, fathers the devil, and becomes immortal. But can he be redeemed?
quote: Ahora, esta pocion me dejara vivir por siempre!
starring: Hector Moreda, Juanita Gomez, Roberta Pino, Adolfo Dorita
